Adding Notes to a Task

When you use the Task component, you can enter additional information about the task or subtask on the Notes tab.

To add notes to a task or subtask:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Notes tab.

  5. Enter notes about the task in the Notes text box.

  6. Click OK.
